source.454b1d82:
def nearest_neighbors(w):
    r = word_vectors.most_similar(positive=[w])
    print("neighbors of:",w)
    for i in r:
        print(i)
        
# By default the logic will take positive if we dont mention positive key word explicitly

# Positive similar words will have cosine distance / score near to 1 as they are very similar to the given word

# This are closely related words and there is semantic relation between them

# There is no relation between this words
